# Period.CreateEpochPeriod method

Returns a new epoch period from a period instance.

```csharp
public static EpochPeriod CreateEpochPeriod(Period period)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| period | Target period. |

## Return Value

Returns a new [`EpochPeriod`](../EpochPeriod.md) from specified [`Period`](../Period.md).
